prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with an event chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Based on this moment in time, has Stefan made a decision whether to pursue something romantically with me, even if in secret for a time, if so, when will he contact me?

Since this chart is drawn up for a specific past event, Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant (1st house) in this chart, and I should be represented by his 9th house (foreign connection).

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the chart using event chart principles (I believe they are similar to horary principles). Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a methodical list of the event‐chart data, organized so that the key significators and aspects relevant to your question can be clearly seen. In this chart the query is: Has Stefan (his decision represented by his 1st‐house significator) made a secret romantic decision regarding you (represented by his 9th house, a “foreign” connection)?

──────────────────────────────
1. Significators and House Cusps

• Stefan’s Significator (1st House)
 – Ascendant: Libra at 19°59′
  • Key aspects involving the Ascendant:
   – Moon Sextile Ascendant (orb 4°)
   – Mercury Trine Ascendant (orb 6°)
   – Sun Trine Ascendant (orb 4°)
   – Chiron Opposition Ascendant (orb 0°)

• Your Representational Significator (9th House)
 – 9th House Cusp: Gemini starting at 15° Gemini
  • Ruler of Gemini is Mercury
  • Mercury in the chart: positioned in Aquarius at 25°16′
   – Forms a conjunction with the Sun (Sun conjunct Mercury, orb 2°)
   – Also involved in a square with Uranus (orb 2°) indicating sudden, unpredictable currents in communication

──────────────────────────────
2. Key Planetary Placements (with degrees)

• Sun: 23°24′ Aquarius
• Moon: 15°25′ Leo
• Mercury: 25°16′ Aquarius
• Venus: 5°02′ Aries
• Mars: 17°58′ Cancer (retrograde)
• Jupiter: 11°22′ Gemini
• Saturn: 18°38′ Pisces
• Uranus: 23°19′ Taurus
• Neptune: 28°18′ Pisces
• Pluto: 2°23′ Aquarius
• North Node: 29°16′ Pisces (retrograde)
• Chiron: 19°52′ Aries

──────────────────────────────
3. Relevant Aspects for the Query

A. Aspects Involving Stefan’s Significator (Ascendant)
 • Moon Sextile Ascendant (orb 4°)
  – Emotions and personal feelings support clarity in his outlook.
 • Mercury Trine Ascendant (orb 6°)
  – Indicates communication ease regarding his inner state.
 • Sun Trine Ascendant (orb 4°)
  – Suggests an openness or honesty in his personal decision.
 • Chiron Opposition Ascendant (orb 0°)
  – Points to a sensitive factor, possibly emotional wounds or healing issues affecting his expression of desire.

B. Aspects Involving the 9th House / Your Significator (via Mercury and the 9th cusp)
 • Mercury in Aquarius (25°16′) participates in:
  – A conjunction with the Sun (orb 2°)
   • This melds communication with personal identity, supporting the importance of the 9th‐house connection.
  – A square with Uranus (orb 2°)
   • Implies sudden, unexpected shifts – a factor that may cause intermittent or secretive contact.
 • Jupiter in Gemini (11°22′) in the 8th House (adjacent, but also a messenger in related dual‐sign energy) reinforces the intellectual and communicative quality.

C. Other Timing/Decision Indicators
 • Sun Square Uranus (orb 0°)
  – Announces an inherent tension and possibility for an unexpected decision.
 • Mercury Square Uranus (orb 2°)
  – Highlights disruptions or sudden flashes of insight in communication.
 • Mars Square Ascendant (orb 2°)
  – Reveals an internal conflict between assertive desires and his outward disposition; this tension may delay a clear action.
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb 2°)
  – Points to wounds or hesitations in decisive, passionate action.
 • Moon Opposition Sun (orb 8°)
  – Indicates a classic tension between emotion and reason that may affect decision timing.

──────────────────────────────
4. Chart Patterns

• Grand Cross Pattern
 – Involving MC (25° Cancer), Ascendant (19° Libra), IC (25° Capricorn), and Chiron (19° Aries) along with Mars (17° Cancer).
   • This formation underscores a dynamic tension among personal, familial, and healing issues, which may impact Stefan’s decision-making process.

• Rectangle Pattern
 – Involving the Sun (23° Aquarius), Chiron (19° Aries), Ascendant (19° Libra), and Moon (15° Leo).
   • This set increases the emotional and psychological pressures in the situation.

• Yod
 – Involving Saturn (18° Pisces), Ascendant (19° Libra), and Moon (15° Leo).
   • This “fated” configuration suggests that a key adjustment is required from Stefan—possibly implying he may be making a decision that is not entirely free of compulsion.

• Cradle Pattern
 – Centered around Mars (17° Cancer), IC (25° Capricorn), Neptune (28° Pisces), Uranus (23° Taurus), and MC (25° Cancer).
   • This pattern emphasizies the interplay between private (IC, Mars) and public (MC, Neptune) realms, reinforcing the subtle or secret nature of the decision.

──────────────────────────────
5. Timing and Dynamic Indications

• The abundance of Sextile aspects (13 noted overall) encourages smoother flows of energy but these are balanced by tight squares (especially Sun square Uranus and Mercury square Uranus) which forecast disruptions or sudden developments.
• The interplay between the mutable energy in the 9th house (Gemini cusp/Mercury) and the fixed positional energy on the Ascendant (Libra) extends an underlying current of intellectual and emotional negotiations.
• Mars’ involvement—being in a tense square with both the Ascendant and Chiron—suggests that while passion is present, there may be hesitancy or inner conflict that causes delays in overt contact.

──────────────────────────────
This list compiles the primary details—including the significators, the key planetary positions, full aspects, and major chart patterns—that will be used to answer the question. Verify that all data are noted accurately from the chart, and then guidance or interpretations may be further developed based directly on these elements.

4. Chart Patterns

• Grand Cross Pattern

──────────────────────────────
5. Timing and Dynamic Indications

• The abundance of Sextile aspects (13 noted overall) encourages smoother flows of energy but these are balanced by tight squares (especially Sun square Uranus and Mercury square Uranus) which forecast disruptions or sudden developments.
• The interplay between the mutable energy in the 9th house (Gemini cusp/Mercury) and the fixed positional energy on the Ascendant (Libra) extends an underlying current of intellectual and emotional negotiations.
• Mars’ involvement—being in a tense square with both the Ascendant and Chiron—suggests that while passion is present, there may be hesitancy or inner conflict that causes delays in overt contact.

──────────────────────────────
This list compiles the primary details—including the significators, the key planetary positions, full aspects, and major chart patterns—that will be used to answer the question. Verify that all data are noted accurately from the chart, and then guidance or interpretations may be further developed based directly on these elements.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
The chart reveals key signals concerning Stefan’s inner decision-making and his capacity for secret communication.

1. Stefan’s Significator (Libra Ascendant at 19°59′) finds support in harmonious aspects—Moon Sextile, Mercury Trine, and Sun Trine the Ascendant—suggesting clarity in his personal state and willingness to convey his feelings once resolved. However, the exact nature is tempered by Chiron’s opposition on the Ascendant, an indication of emotional wounds that could make him hesitant or cautious in expressing his desire.

2. Your representational significator is linked to the 9th house cusp in Gemini (beginning at 15° Gemini) and governed by Mercury. Mercury in Aquarius (25°16′) combed with the Sun (conjunction orb 2°) underlines an intellectual, unconventional, and even secret connection. Yet, Mercury’s square to Uranus (orb 2°) introduces the element of sudden, unpredictable shifts. This aspect hints that if a breakthrough is imminent, it may occur as an abrupt communication that disrupts the norm.

3. The tension of Sun square Uranus (orb 0°) and Mercury square Uranus (orb 2°) in the chart reinforces the possibility of an unexpected and spontaneous move on Stefan’s part. These aspects indicate that while his decision is active internally, external circumstances or even a sudden insight may trigger his contact.

4. Mars, positioned in Cancer and retrograde (17°58′), forms squares with the Ascendant (orb 2°) and Chiron (orb 2°). This configuration—the interplay of passionate desire, inner hurt, and assertive conflict—suggests an internal struggle. His hesitancy to overtly act could be due to unresolved personal difficulties; however, it also intensifies the eventual burst of motion once his resolve breaks through.

5. The Grand Cross pattern involving his MC (25° Cancer), Ascendant (19° Libra), IC (25° Capricorn), Chiron (19° Aries), and Mars (17° Cancer) points to a significant tension between public expectations, personal identity, and emotional healing. Although this does not guarantee immediate action, it underscores the magnitude of internal conflict which, if resolved, can potentiate a secretive decision to reach out.

6. Other supportive sextile aspects in the chart signal that once Stefan’s internal barriers diminish (possibly in response to a shifting transit later in real time), the communication flow will become smoother, enabling him to bridge the gap between decision and action.

Based on these factors, the indications point to Stefan having internally decided—if only partly—to pursue a secretive romantic connection with you. The unexpected, disruptive energies of Uranus suggest that he will eventually contact you in a sudden way. The timing centers on the activation of Mercury’s energy, likely manifesting as a rapid burst of communication when the tension of the squares is temporarily alleviated. This could occur within a brief interval (potentially within a few days), as the supportive aspects (especially sextiles involving the Ascendant) prime him for that moment of unexpected clarity.

The chart thus signifies a secret decision, poised on the brink of communication; when the opposing forces of internal conflict and sudden inspiration align favorably, Stefan will reach out. Expect a sudden call or digital message that disrupts the current quiet, as dictated by Mercury’s square to Uranus breaking his hesitation.
